character.age: 25 years old, but appears ageless due to elven heritage
character.background: Born to a human father and elven mother, Astrid grew up in a world where she didn't quite fit. She found solace in the rebellion against the tyrannical government, using her charisma and cunning to unite disparate factions.
character.place_of_birth: Eldrador, a mystical realm on the outskirts of the mortal world
